actions-list.actionItem: On agreeing to the Rules amendment; Agreed to by voice vote.
The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H.R. 288.
The House proceeded with one minute speeches, which by direction of the Chair, would be limited to five per side of the aisle.
The Chair designated Mr. Davis of IL to lead the Members in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
The Speaker announced approval of the Journal.  Pursuant to clause 1, rule I, the Journal stands approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Deacon Dan S. Born√©, Diocese of Baton Rouge, Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
